assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: Dr. Grossman received honoraria for serving on the Advisory Board of Orlucent, Inc. Dr. Secrest, Mr. Bishop, Mr. Flint, Ms. Smart, Ms. Strunck, and Dr. Boucher have no conflicts of interest to disclose.

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: The University of Utah Institutional Review Board approved this study (#101237).
